reviews.name: CAP Walking D-Shaped Neoprene Walking Dumbbells, 2pk
reviews.title: Just what I needed

reviews.name: CAP Walking D-Shaped Neoprene Walking Dumbbells, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: These are nice, fairly soft to the touch and you get a nice grip. They are comfortable to hold while you walk.
reviews.title: Very Nice!

reviews.name: CAP Walking D-Shaped Neoprene Walking Dumbbells, 2pk
reviews.reviewText: I like these. For me, as the rounded side is more heavily weighted than the grip side, it works better to hold that side, and there is still an excellent grip due to the neoprene.
reviews.title: Like them, and the price is right
